channel.title: CVE Feed for Alessandro Furieri -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Alessandro Furieri -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-2923|2024-08-05T14:09:17.775Z -- alessandro%20furieri -- freexl
item.description: An exploitable heap based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the 'read_biff_next_record function' of FreeXL 1.0.3. A specially crafted XLS file can cause a memory corruption resulting in remote code execution. An attacker can send malicious XLS file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-2924|2024-08-05T14:09:17.773Z -- alessandro%20furieri -- freexl
item.description: An exploitable heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the read_legacy_biff function of FreeXL 1.0.3. A specially crafted XLS file can cause a memory corruption resulting in remote code execution. An attacker can send malicious XLS file to trigger this vulnerability.
